content: * 68 st round 14 *p2 k1 yo k1 p2 k5 p2 k1 yo k1 * round 15 *p2 k3 p2 k1 s2 k1 psso k1 p2 k3 * 60 st round 16 * p2 k3 3x * round 17 *p2 s1 k2 psso p2 s2 k1 psso p2 s1 k2 psso * 52 st round 18 *p2 k1 yo k1 p2 k1 p2 k1 yo k1 * round 19 *p2 k3 p1 s2 k1 psso p1 k3 * 44 st round 20 *p2 k3 p1 k1 p1 k3 * abbreviations x times s slip ~ about chart key round 21 *p2 s1 k2 psso s2 k1 psso s1 k2 psso * 36 st psso pass slipped stitch over pm place round 22 *p2 k1 yo k3 yo k1 * size one size fits most preemie 12 marker round 23 *p2 k2 s2 k1 psso k2 * 28 st knit yarn over inch head circumference to three round 24 *p2 k5 * months 15 inch head circumference stitch guide this pattern is worked in round 25 *p2 k1 s2 k1 psso k1 * 20 st the round the right side is always facing s2 k1 psso round 26 *p2 k3 * for larger size co 125 st follow these directions if you wish to purl round 27 *p2 s2 k1 psso * 12 st work rounds 1-4 until piece is ~6 practice the yo cable working flat round 28 *p2 k1 * s1 k2 no stitch yo cable stitch multiple of 5 st +2 psso placeholder break yarn leaving an 8 inch tail thread tail onto darning needle and pass through each repeat between * to end of the rem 12 st fasten_off by pulling gently until hole is completely closed co 29 st work p2 k3 rib for six row weave in ends for preemie size wash and block gently to even stitches lay flat to row 1 p2 *s1 k2 psso p2 * dry for newborn size completely wet cap and stretch to 8 inches pin and let dry or row 2 k2 *p1 yo p1 k2 * block using a 16 inch sphere designer used a 16 inch softball row 3 p2 *k3 p2 * © maureen hefti all rights reserved reproduction of all or part of this work is forbidden without the express permission of the author row 4 k2 *p3 k2 * please do not copy without purchase or permission encourage your friends to support knitting design through pattern purchase ravenousknits com repeat row 1-4 for pattern
